channel.title: [PI] Questions! HELP! [PI]
channel.description:
Hello, i have a few questions which i need help with please.
1. How do i change my client name?
2. How do i edit my client name please?
This is Pi based so please can i get some help needed!
Rep ++ for the help given!

item.title: [PI] Questions! HELP! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Project_Divinity Project Divinity
item.description:
@Project_Divinity wrote:

Nooo the actual client the name on it. Not ingame.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Questions! HELP! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @stooks stooks
item.description:
@stooks wrote:

client name as in when you log in it says “welcome to ‘xxx’” ? and the makeover mage, the bank, and the chatbox?

if so go to these files, search for the server name that already is with “ctrl+f” type in the server name and replace it with the name you want.

in your source search for client.java go to that and change all of the server names to desired.
in your source search for playerassistant.java go to that and yadayadayada
source-config.java do the same
commands.java in source
that’s the main ones, just keep looking

Read full topic
